description.narrative: As a greenfield NBFI, AFC has made progress in introducing products and processes to support its cocoa farmer client-base with appropriate financial services. With these operations up and running, the next challenge is to position AFC for the future and to (a) make operations more sustainable by diversification into different sectors, and through development of alternative products in order to minimize concentration risks; and (b) to contribute to the success of their clients’ businesses and livelihoods, with the aim of reducing credit risk, by offering deposit products and insurance services. The aim of this project is to do so by deepening AFC’s organizational strategy.
